name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.write-lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When a write lock is held on the namenode for a long time,
    this will be logged as the lock is released. This sets how long the
    lock must be held for logging to occur.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data-key-size-bits
description: Mapreduce encrypt data key size default is 128

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.expiry
description:
Cache expiry time for a Key, after which the cache Queue for this
    key will be dropped. Default = 12hrs

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.num.refill.threads
description:
Number of threads to use for refilling depleted EncryptedKeyVersion
    cache Queues

name: dfs.datanode.cache.revocation.polling.ms
description:
How often the DataNode should poll to see if the clients have
    stopped using a replica that the DataNode wants to uncache.
